meanings.sent1: The postman will redeliver the package tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: Please redeliver the letter to the correct address.
meanings.sent3: I asked the courier to redeliver the lost package, and they brought it to the wrong house!
meanings.sent4: The teacher redelivered the assignment with detailed feedback.
meanings.sent5: The company promised to redeliver the damaged goods promptly.

meanings.sent1: She will redeliver the borrowed book to the library.
meanings.sent2: The customer decided to redeliver the faulty product for a refund.
meanings.sent3: He had to redeliver the stolen item to its rightful owner.
meanings.sent4: The kind neighbor redelivered the misplaced keys to the front door.
meanings.sent5: The store policy allows customers to redeliver unwanted items within 30 days.

meanings.sent1: The lawyer will redeliver the documents to the client for review.
meanings.sent2: The courier service agreed to redeliver the package to the recipient.
meanings.sent3: The forgetful friend had to redeliver the message to the intended recipient.
meanings.sent4: The company decided to redeliver the presentation to the investors with updated information.
meanings.sent5: The teacher had to redeliver the instructions to the confused students.
